dependencies.description:
The NVIDIA HPC SDK is a comprehensive suite of compilers, libraries and
tools essential to maximizing developer productivity and the performance
and portability of HPC applications. The NVIDIA HPC SDK C, C++, and
Fortran compilers support GPU acceleration of HPC modeling and
simulation applications with standard C++ and Fortran, OpenACC
directives, and CUDA. GPU-accelerated math libraries maximize
performance on common HPC algorithms, and optimized communications
libraries enable standards-based multi-GPU and scalable systems
programming. Performance profiling and debugging tools simplify porting
and optimization of HPC applications.
dependencies.name: c

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description: Bulker: multi-container environment manager
dependent_to.name: bulker

dependent_to.description:
C-Vise is a super-parallel Python port of the C-Reduce. The port is
fully compatible to the C-Reduce and uses the same efficient LLVM-based
C/C++ reduction tool named clang_delta.
dependent_to.name: cvise

dependent_to.description:
The Global Extensible Open Power Manager (GEOPM) Runtime is designed to
enhance energy efficiency of applications through active hardware
configuration.
dependent_to.name: geopm-runtime

dependent_to.description:
The Global Extensible Open Power Manager (GEOPM) Service provides a user
interface for accessing hardware telemetry and settings securely. Note:
GEOPM interfaces with hardware using Model Specific Registers (MSRs).
For proper usage make sure MSRs are made available via the msr or msr-
safe kernel modules by your administrator.
dependent_to.name: geopm-service

dependent_to.description:
HybPiper was designed for targeted sequence capture, in which DNA
sequencing libraries are enriched for gene regions of interest,
especially for phylogenetics. HybPiper is a suite of Python scripts that
wrap and connect bioinformatics tools in order to extract target
sequences from high-throughput DNA sequencing reads
dependent_to.name: hybpiper

dependent_to.description:
MongoDB is a source-available cross-platform document-oriented database
program. Classified as a NoSQL database program, MongoDB uses JSON-like
documents with optional schemas.
dependent_to.name: mongodb

dependent_to.description:
A simple way to train and use PyTorch models with multi-GPU, TPU, mixed-
precision.
dependent_to.name: py-accelerate

dependent_to.description:
ADB-Enhanced is a Swiss-army knife for Android testing and development.
A command-line interface to trigger various scenarios like screen
rotation, battery saver mode, data saver mode, doze mode, permission
grant/revocation.
dependent_to.name: py-adb-enhanced

dependent_to.description:
Anvi’o is a comprehensive platform that brings together many aspects of
today’s cutting-edge computational strategies of data-enabled
microbiology, including genomics, metagenomics, metatranscriptomics,
pangenomics, metapangenomics, phylogenomics, and microbial population
genetics in an integrated and easy-to-use fashion through extensive
interactive visualization capabilities.
dependent_to.name: py-anvio

dependent_to.description:
Biobb_structure_checking provides a series of functions to check the
quality of a 3D structure intended to facilitate the setup of a
molecular dynamics simulation of protein or nucleic acids systems
dependent_to.name: py-biobb-structure-checking

dependent_to.description: Core classes and components used by CellProfiler.
dependent_to.name: py-cellprofiler-core

dependent_to.description:
Circus is a program that will let you run and watch multiple processes
and sockets.
dependent_to.name: py-circus

dependent_to.description:
An integrated large-scale model training system with efficient
parallelization techniques.
dependent_to.name: py-colossalai

dependent_to.description: Common workflow language reference implementation
dependent_to.name: py-cwltool

dependent_to.description: A workflow engine for cycling systems.
dependent_to.name: py-cylc-flow

dependent_to.description: Cylc UI Server.
dependent_to.name: py-cylc-uiserver

dependent_to.description:
Scalable asynchronous hyperparameter optimization, neural architecture
search, and parallel ensemble of predictive models.
dependent_to.name: py-deephyper

dependent_to.description:
DeepSpeed library. DeepSpeed enables world's most powerful language
models like MT-530B and BLOOM. It is an easy-to-use deep learning
optimization software suite that powers unprecedented scale and speed
for both training and inference.
dependent_to.name: py-deepspeed

dependent_to.description:
Devito is a Python package to implement optimized stencil computation.
(e.g., finite differences, image processing, machine learning) from
high-level symbolic problem definitions. Devito builds on SymPy and
employs automated code generation and just-in-time compilation to
execute optimized computational kernels on several computer platforms,
including CPUs, GPUs, and clusters thereof.
dependent_to.name: py-devito

dependent_to.description:
Deep Graph Library (DGL). DGL is an easy-to-use, high performance and
scalable Python package for deep learning on graphs. DGL is framework
agnostic, meaning if a deep graph model is a component of an end-to-end
application, the rest of the logics can be implemented in any major
frameworks, such as PyTorch, Apache MXNet or TensorFlow.
dependent_to.name: py-dgl

dependent_to.description: Distributed scheduler for Dask
dependent_to.name: py-distributed

dependent_to.description: Git for data scientists - manage your code and data together.
dependent_to.name: py-dvc

dependent_to.description: This package provides the official implementation of FlashAttention.
dependent_to.name: py-flash-attn

dependent_to.description: NFS-safe file locking with timeouts for POSIX and Windows
dependent_to.name: py-flufl-lock

dependent_to.description: Framework for studying fluid dynamics.
dependent_to.name: py-fluiddyn

dependent_to.description: Simple Client for Earth Engine Uploads with Selenium Support.
dependent_to.name: py-geeup

dependent_to.description:
The Global Extensible Open Power Manager (GEOPM) Service provides a user
interface for accessing hardware telemetry and settings securely.
dependent_to.name: py-geopmdpy

dependent_to.description:
The Global Extensible Open Power Manager (GEOPM) Service provides a user
interface for accessing hardware telemetry and settings securely.
dependent_to.name: py-geopmpy

dependent_to.description:
Turn (almost) any command line program into a full GUI application with
one line
dependent_to.name: py-gooey

dependent_to.description: An utility to monitor NVIDIA GPU status and usage.
dependent_to.name: py-gpustat

dependent_to.description:
Horovod is a distributed deep learning training framework for
TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, and Apache MXNet.
dependent_to.name: py-horovod

dependent_to.description:
inStrain is python program for analysis of co-occurring genome
populations from metagenomes that allows highly accurate genome
comparisons, analysis of coverage, microdiversity, and linkage, and
sensitive SNP detection with gene localization and synonymous non-
synonymous identification.
dependent_to.name: py-instrain

dependent_to.description: IPython Kernel for Jupyter
dependent_to.name: py-ipykernel

dependent_to.description: IPython's architecture for parallel and distributed computing.
dependent_to.name: py-ipyparallel

dependent_to.description:
Jarvis-util is a library which contains various utilities to aid with
creating shell scripts within Python. This library contains wrappers for
executing shell commands locally, SSH, SCP, MPI, argument parsing, and
various other random utilities.
dependent_to.name: py-jarvis-util

dependent_to.description: Library for managing ensemble-like collections of computations.
dependent_to.name: py-libensemble

dependent_to.description: The deep learning framework to pretrain, finetune and deploy AI models.
dependent_to.name: py-lightning

dependent_to.description:
Melissa is a file-avoiding, adaptive, fault-tolerant and elastic
framework, to run large-scale sensitivity analysis or deep-surrogate
training on supercomputers. This package builds the launcher and server
modules.
dependent_to.name: py-melissa-core

dependent_to.description: A module for monitoring memory usage of a python program
dependent_to.name: py-memory-profiler

dependent_to.description: Merlin Workflow for HPC.
dependent_to.name: py-merlin

dependent_to.description: Rose, a framework for meteorological suites.
dependent_to.name: py-metomi-rose

dependent_to.description: MNE python project for MEG and EEG data analysis.
dependent_to.name: py-mne

dependent_to.description: Modin: Make your pandas code run faster by changing one line of code.
dependent_to.name: py-modin

dependent_to.description: Remote opening and control for neovim: nvr
dependent_to.name: py-neovim-remote

dependent_to.description:
Flexible metadata store for MLOps, built for research and production
teams that run a lot of experiments.
dependent_to.name: py-neptune-client

dependent_to.description: Python library neuron morphology analysis
dependent_to.name: py-neurom

dependent_to.description:
An interactive NVIDIA-GPU process viewer and beyond, the one-stop
solution for GPU process management.
dependent_to.name: py-nvitop

dependent_to.description:
Paralleltask is a simple and lightweight parallel task engine. It can
launch a given number of tasks from a batch of independent tasks, and
keep this number of running tasks until all tasks are completed.
dependent_to.name: py-paralleltask

dependent_to.description: Simple data dependent workflows in Python
dependent_to.name: py-parsl

dependent_to.description:
Petastorm is a library enabling the use of Parquet storage from
Tensorflow, Pytorch, and other Python-based ML training frameworks.
dependent_to.name: py-petastorm

dependent_to.description:
A lightweight python toolkit for gluing together restartable, robust
shell pipelines.
dependent_to.name: py-piper

dependent_to.description: A library to choose unique available network ports.
dependent_to.name: py-portpicker

dependent_to.description:
PSI/J is an abstraction layer over cluster schedulers to write scheduler
agnostic HPC applications.
dependent_to.name: py-psij-python

dependent_to.description: Monitors and limits process resource.
dependent_to.name: py-psmon

dependent_to.description:
Distributed job execution application built for Galaxy
(http://galaxyproject.org/).
dependent_to.name: py-pulsar-galaxy-lib

dependent_to.description:
A collection of data classes, data structures, and other utility classes
that are aimed for use in workflow
dependent_to.name: py-pyaestro

dependent_to.description:
HMMER is a biological sequence analysis tool that uses profile hidden
Markov models to search for sequence homologs. HMMER3 is developed and
maintained by the Eddy/Rivas Laboratory at Harvard University. pyhmmer
is a Python package, implemented using the Cython language, that
provides bindings to HMMER3.
dependent_to.name: py-pyhmmer

dependent_to.description:
A small Python library to limit the resources used by a function by
executing it inside a subprocess.
dependent_to.name: py-pynisher

dependent_to.description:
PyNucleus is a finite element code that specifically targets nonlocal
operators.
dependent_to.name: py-pynucleus

dependent_to.description:
A plugin for the pytest framework that allows developers to detect
whether any file handles or other file-like objects were inadvertently
left open at the end of a unit test
dependent_to.name: py-pytest-openfiles

dependent_to.description:
Qiskit Nature is an open-source framework which supports solving quantum
mechanical natural science problems using quantum computing algorithms
dependent_to.name: py-qiskit-nature

dependent_to.description:
Qiskit is an open-source SDK for working with quantum computers at the
level of extended quantum circuits, operators, and algorithms.
dependent_to.name: py-qiskit-terra

dependent_to.description:
Ray provides a simple, universal API for building distributed
applications.
dependent_to.name: py-ray

dependent_to.description:
RDT is a Python library used to transform data for data science
libraries and preserve the transformations in order to revert them as
needed.
dependent_to.name: py-rdt

dependent_to.description: Calculation handler for SCINE Chemoton
dependent_to.name: py-scine-puffin

dependent_to.description:
SfePy (https://sfepy.org/) is a software for solving systems of coupled
partial differential equations (PDEs) by the finite element method in
1D, 2D and 3D. It can be viewed both as black-box PDE solver, and as a
Python package which can be used for building custom applications.
dependent_to.name: py-sfepy

dependent_to.description:
SMAC is a tool for algorithm configuration to optimize the parameters of
arbitrary algorithms, including hyperparameter optimization of Machine
Learning algorithms.
dependent_to.name: py-smac

dependent_to.description:
A workflow library to easily integrate machine learning libraries with
high performance computing simulations and applications
dependent_to.name: py-smartsim

dependent_to.description:
Tensors and Dynamic neural networks in Python with strong GPU
acceleration.
dependent_to.name: py-torch

dependent_to.description: Graph Neural Network Library for PyTorch.
dependent_to.name: py-torch-geometric

dependent_to.description:
A collection of open source benchmarks used to evaluate PyTorch
performance.
dependent_to.name: py-torchbenchmark

dependent_to.description:
UCX-Py is the Python interface for UCX, a low-level high-performance
networking library. UCX and UCX-Py supports several transport methods
including InfiniBand and NVLink while still using traditional networking
protocols like TCP.
dependent_to.name: py-ucx-py

dependent_to.description:
Ultralytics YOLOv8, developed by Ultralytics, is a cutting-edge, state-
of-the-art (SOTA) model that builds upon the success of previous YOLO
versions and introduces new features and improvements to further boost
performance and flexibility. YOLOv8 is designed to be fast, accurate,
and easy to use, making it an excellent choice for a wide range of
object detection, image segmentation and image classification tasks.
dependent_to.name: py-ultralytics

dependent_to.description: A tool for visualizing and tracking your machine learning experiments.
dependent_to.name: py-wandb

dependent_to.description:
Workflow management system to create reproducible and scalable data
analyses.
dependent_to.name: snakemake

dependent_to.description:
Survey is a high level performance tool product from Trenza, Inc. The
survey collector/analytics framework is a new generation, high level,
lightweight multiplatform Linux tool set that targets metric collection
for high level performance analysis of applications running on both
single node and on large scale platforms, including the Cray platforms.
The collector is designed to work on sequential, MPI, OpenMP, and hybrid
codes and directly leverages several interfaces available for tools
inside current MPI implementations including: MPICH, MVAPICH, MPT, and
OpenMPI. It also supports multiple architectures and has been tested on
machines based on Intel, AMD, ARM, and IBM P8/9 processors and
integrated AMD and NVIDIA GPUs. Survey is a licensed product with the
source not openly available. To access the survey source and build with
spack please contact: Trenza Inc. via: dmont@trenzasynergy.com or
jeg@trenzasynergy.com
dependent_to.name: survey

description:
psutil is a cross-platform library for retrieving information on running
processes and system utilization (CPU, memory, disks, network) in
Python.
name: py-psutil

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
